bibdata.title: ISO/IEC International Standard
Information technology-- Local and metropolitan area networks-- Part 11: Amendment 5: Spectrum and Transmit Power Management Extensions in the 5 GHz band in Europe
ISO/IEC International Standard - Information technology-- Local and metropolitan area networks-- Part 11: Amendment 5: Spectrum and Transmit Power Management Extensions in the 5 GHz band in Europe
bibdata.docidentifier: ISO/IEC 8802-11:2005/Amd.5:2006(E) IEEE Std 802.11h-2003 (Amendment to IEEE Std 802.11-1999)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Adoption IEEE Std 802.11h-2003. This amendment specifies the extensions to IEEE 8802.11(TM) for wireless local area networks (WLANs) providing mechanisms for dynamic frequency selection (DFS) and transmit power control (TPC) that may be used to satisfy regulatory requirements for operation in the 5 GHz band in Europe.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: ISO/IEC 8802-11 IEEE Std 802.11 Second edition 2005-08-01 ISO/IEC 8802 11:2005(E) IEEE Std 802.11i-2003 Edition
